{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Hotel Manager",
  "description": "TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable company in the hospitality sector, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Hotel Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Hotel Manager, you will oversee daily hotel operations, ensure guest satisfaction, and manage all departments including front office, housekeeping, and food &amp; beverage.


Responsibilities


	Manage hotel, restaurant, and lifestyle operations to achieve excellence in service delivery
	Supervise and train staff to maintain world-class hospitality standards
	Oversee food &amp; beverage services, inventory, and cost control
	Monitor budgets, forecasts, and ensure overall profitability
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and regulatory standards.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or related fields
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in hotel management
	Strong leadership, communication, and financial management skills
	Experience managing food &amp; beverage operations and guest experience programs.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-20",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-21",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TeamAce"
    
  },

  },

    }

}



Hotel Manager Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable company in the hospitality sector, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Hotel Manager

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Hotel Manager, you will oversee daily hotel operations, ensure guest satisfaction, and manage all departments including front office, housekeeping, and food & beverage.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Manage hotel, restaurant, and lifestyle operations to achieve excellence in service delivery
	Supervise and train staff to maintain world-class hospitality standards
	Oversee food & beverage services, inventory, and cost control
	Monitor budgets, forecasts, and ensure overall profitability
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and regulatory standards.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree in Hospitality Management, Business Administration, or related fields
	Minimum of 3 years of experience in hotel management
	Strong leadership, communication, and financial management skills
	Experience managing food & beverage operations and guest experience programs.


Salary
N200,000 - N250,000 monthly.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development (BD) ExecutiveJob",
  "description": "At TeamAce, we help businesses across different industries thrive. We work with businesses to create their desired change by getting the right people, designing bespoke business processes, leveraging data, applying insights and technology. We combine our expertise and take different bespoke approaches to solve different business challenges because we believe there is no one size fits all approach. This way, you keep your eyes on the price and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development (BD)&nbsp;Executive
Job Locations:&nbsp;Lagos&nbsp;(Tradefair, Alaba, Ojo, Lagos Island / Mainland)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Identify and pursue new business opportunities through networking, market research.
	Develop and implement strategies to expand the company&rsquo;s client base and market presence.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and partners.
	Negotiate contracts and close business deals to achieve sales and revenue target
	Monitor industry trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify growth opportunities.


Qualifications &amp; Skills


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Marketing, Sales, or any other relevant fieldl
	&nbsp;1 - 2 years of proven experience in business development, sales, or a similar role preferably in an FMCG, Paper Industry (Tissue), Solar, Phone.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to develop and maintain client relationships.
	Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
	Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset.


Salary
N100,000 / month&nbsp;with commission",
  "datePosted": "2025-10-20",
  "validThrough": "2025-11-21",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TeamAce"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "189061"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Business Development (BD) ExecutiveJob at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        At TeamAce, we help businesses across different industries thrive. We work with businesses to create their desired change by getting the right people, designing bespoke business processes, leveraging data, applying insights and technology. We combine our expertise and take different bespoke approaches to solve different business challenges because we believe there is no one size fits all approach. This way, you keep your eyes on the price and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development (BD) Executive
Job Locations: Lagos (Tradefair, Alaba, Ojo, Lagos Island / Mainland)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Identify and pursue new business opportunities through networking, market research.
	Develop and implement strategies to expand the company’s client base and market presence.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, stakeholders, and partners.
	Negotiate contracts and close business deals to achieve sales and revenue target
	Monitor industry trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify growth opportunities.


Qualifications & Skills


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Marketing, Sales, or any other relevant fieldl
	 1 - 2 years of proven experience in business development, sales, or a similar role preferably in an FMCG, Paper Industry (Tissue), Solar, Phone.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills.
	Ability to develop and maintain client relationships.
	Excellent organizational and time-management skills.
	Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset.


Salary
N100,000 / month with commission    

    

        Click here to Apply
